com.kaazing.gateway.jms.server.spi.security

Class JmsAuthorization

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kaazing.gateway.jms.server.spi.security.JmsAuthorization

  • public abstract class JmsAuthorization
extends Object
    A JmsAuthorization is responsible for providing fine-grained access control for client actions. By default, each client action is denied. Subclasses can selectively enable access to specific client actions.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JmsAuthorization() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canAcknowledge()
      Returns true if the subject is authorized to send acknowledgments, otherwise false.
      boolean canConnect()
      Deprecated. 
      Please use canConnect(String clientID) instead, since that method provides additional information.
      boolean canConnect(String clientID)
      Returns true if the subject is authorized to connect using the given clientID (as set on the JMS Connection object), otherwise false.
      boolean canDurableSubscribeToTopic(String topicName, String selector)
      Returns true if the subject is authorized to create this durable topic subscription, otherwise false.
      boolean canPublishToQueue(JmsQueue queueKind, String queueName, JmsPersistence persistence, JmsMessageType bodyType, ByteBuffer body)
      Returns true if the subject is authorized to publish this message, otherwise false.
      boolean canPublishToQueue(JmsQueue queueKind, String queueName, JmsPersistence persistence, JmsMessageType bodyType, JmsMapContent mapContent)
      Returns true if the subject is authorized to publish this message, otherwise false.
      boolean canPublishToTopic(JmsTopic topicKind, String topicName, JmsPersistence persistence, JmsMessageType bodyType, ByteBuffer body)
      Returns true if the subject is authorized to publish this message, otherwise false.
      boolean canPublishToTopic(JmsTopic topicKind, String topicName, JmsPersistence persistence, JmsMessageType bodyType, JmsMapContent mapContent)
      Returns true if the subject is authorized to publish this map message, otherwise false.
      boolean canSubscribeToQueue(JmsQueue queueKind, String queueName, String selector)
      Returns true if the subject is authorized to create this queue subscription, otherwise false.
      boolean canSubscribeToTopic(JmsTopic topicKind, String topicName, String selector)
      Returns true if the subject is authorized to create this non-durable topic subscription, otherwise false.
      boolean canTransact()
      Returns true if the subject is authorized to begin, send, abort, and commit transactions, otherwise false.

    • Method Detail

      • canConnect

        public boolean canConnect(String clientID)
        Returns true if the subject is authorized to connect using the given clientID (as set on the JMS Connection object), otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        clientID - Client id as set on the client's JMS Connection object, or null if none is set.
        Returns:
        true if authorized, otherwise false

      • canConnect

        @Deprecated
public boolean canConnect()
        Deprecated. Please use canConnect(String clientID) instead, since that method provides additional information.
        Returns true if the subject is authorized to connect, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        true if authorized, otherwise false

      • canDurableSubscribeToTopic

        public boolean canDurableSubscribeToTopic(String topicName,
                                 String selector)
        Returns true if the subject is authorized to create this durable topic subscription, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        topicName - the topic for this subscription
        selector - the selector for this subscription
        Returns:
        true if authorized, otherwise false

      • canSubscribeToTopic

        public boolean canSubscribeToTopic(JmsTopic topicKind,
                          String topicName,
                          String selector)
        Returns true if the subject is authorized to create this non-durable topic subscription, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        topicKind - the topic kind for this subscription
        topicName - the topic for this subscription
        selector - the selector for this subscription
        Returns:
        true if authorized, otherwise false

      • canSubscribeToQueue

        public boolean canSubscribeToQueue(JmsQueue queueKind,
                          String queueName,
                          String selector)
        Returns true if the subject is authorized to create this queue subscription, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        queueKind - the queue kind for this subscription
        queueName - the queue for this subscription
        selector - the selector for this subscription
        Returns:
        true if authorized, otherwise false

      • canPublishToTopic

        public boolean canPublishToTopic(JmsTopic topicKind,
                        String topicName,
                        JmsPersistence persistence,
                        JmsMessageType bodyType,
                        ByteBuffer body)
        Returns true if the subject is authorized to publish this message, otherwise false. This method is called for non-map messages (supported message types are defined in JmsMessageType).
        Parameters:
        topicKind - the topic kind for this message
        topicName - the topic for this message
        persistence - the delivery mode for this message
        bodyType - the message body type
        body - the message body
        Returns:
        true if authorized, otherwise false
        See Also:
        canPublishToTopic(JmsTopic, String, JmsPersistence, JmsMessageType, JmsMapContent)

      • canPublishToTopic

        public boolean canPublishToTopic(JmsTopic topicKind,
                        String topicName,
                        JmsPersistence persistence,
                        JmsMessageType bodyType,
                        JmsMapContent mapContent)
        Returns true if the subject is authorized to publish this map message, otherwise false. This method is called for map messages only (supported message types are defined in JmsMessageType).
        Parameters:
        topicKind - the topic kind for this message
        topicName - the topic for this message
        persistence - the delivery mode for this message
        bodyType - the message body type (always JmsMessageType.MAP)
        body - the message map body
        Returns:
        true if authorized, otherwise false
        See Also:
        canPublishToTopic(JmsTopic, String, JmsPersistence, JmsMessageType, ByteBuffer)

      • canPublishToQueue

        public boolean canPublishToQueue(JmsQueue queueKind,
                        String queueName,
                        JmsPersistence persistence,
                        JmsMessageType bodyType,
                        ByteBuffer body)
        Returns true if the subject is authorized to publish this message, otherwise false. This method is called for non-map messages (supported message types are defined in JmsMessageType).
        Parameters:
        queueKind - the queue kind for this message
        queueName - the queue for this message
        persistence - the delivery mode for this message
        bodyType - the message body type
        body - the message body
        Returns:
        true if authorized, otherwise false
        See Also:
        canPublishToQueue(JmsQueue, String, JmsPersistence, JmsMessageType, JmsMapContent)

      • canPublishToQueue

        public boolean canPublishToQueue(JmsQueue queueKind,
                        String queueName,
                        JmsPersistence persistence,
                        JmsMessageType bodyType,
                        JmsMapContent mapContent)
        Returns true if the subject is authorized to publish this message, otherwise false. This method is called for map messages only (supported message types are defined in JmsMessageType).
        Parameters:
        queueKind - the queue kind for this map message
        queueName - the queue for this message
        persistence - the delivery mode for this message
        bodyType - the message body type (always JmsMessageType.MAP)
        body - the message map body
        Returns:
        true if authorized, otherwise false
        See Also:
        canPublishToQueue(JmsQueue, String, JmsPersistence, JmsMessageType, ByteBuffer)
